snippet.title: Aether: Wizard Life — Kickstarter Official Trailer | 4K
snippet.description:
Support us on Kickstarter: http://bit.ly/3ToB4BN
For more updates on our official Twitter: https://twitter.com/AetherLifeGame

Aether is a 2D side-scrolling hybrid-genre game, combining Daily Life Simulation and Metroidvania Action-Adventure. The game is inspired by Stardew Valley, Magicka, Hollow Knight, Terraria, Rune Factory, and Spiritfarer.

You assume the role of a wizard freshly graduated from the Academy. You are now going to work under the Ministry of Magic in the Starfall Kingdom with a tower on a secluded island as your new home.

Grow crops, make a potion, fish, cook, craft, fight, help the villagers, serve the kingdom, and unravel the secret of magic and the lost history of Starfall and beyond in Aether.

Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2195450

Twitter: https://twitter.com/AetherLifeGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/VonderGames
